item.title: [sys] inotify
item.description: Inotify The inotify API provides a mechanism for monitoring filesystem events. Inotify can be used to monitor individual files, or to monitor directories. When a directory is monitored, inotify will return events for the directory itself, and for files inside the directory. å››ä¸ªAPI func InotifyInit() (fd int, err error) func InotifyInit1(flags int) (fd int, err error) è¿™ä¸ªå¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®flag
